plot: Michael is in trouble once again as Jan busts him for declaring it's "Movie Monday" where everyone watches a movie and neglects work. Angela pushes Dwight to make a move on Michael's job while Pam and Jim find creative ways to waste time.

An office power play ensues when ultra-serious Angela, offended by Michael's various antics and his inefficient leadership, leans heavily on Dwight to make a push for Michael's job. Meanwhile, Pam puts on a lunchtime fashion show; and Jim's attempts to play a video game turn deadly---in a virtual sense.—Brock A. Zimmerman

Dwight, believing that he can do a better job of running Dunder-Mifflin Scranton than Michael, attempts a coup. Meanwhile, Jim is repeatedly killed by his Stamford coworkers while playing all-office deathmatches in the computer game Call of Duty.—Seth Christenfeld
